title: Add ProApp.tsx — Standalone Pro Space with useState Navigation

requirements.text: Create a new file `frontend/src/components/ProApp.tsx` as a fully self-contained React component (no React Router, no external navigation libs). It must include all pro-space screens and sub-components inline or imported locally: Dashboard, Radar, Wallet, Business, Subscription Modal, and Subscription Success animation. Navigation between these screens must be driven exclusively by `useState`. The component must export `ProApp` as a default export.

quotes: Greffe ProApp.tsx sur le projet existant. Ne pas reconstruire ce qui fonctionne déjà.

acceptanceCriteria: ProApp.tsx exists as a new file and exports a default React component named ProApp
All navigation within ProApp uses useState with no React Router or external routing library
The component renders Dashboard, Radar, Wallet, and Business tabs
A Subscription Modal screen and a Subscription Success animation screen are included
No existing files outside ProApp.tsx are broken or modified by this addition

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/components/ProApp.tsx`, define a color constants object `C` that includes the value `t4: '#2E2E3E'`. Use `C.t4` for the `IconCamera` fill color and for all other very subtle/discrete UI elements (placeholder text, dividers, inactive icon strokes, secondary backgrounds, etc.).

quotes: Ajouter dans l objet C : t4: '#2E2E3E'
Utiliser C.t4 pour IconCamera et tous les éléments très discrets.

acceptanceCriteria: The C object inside ProApp.tsx contains the key t4 with value '#2E2E3E'
IconCamera SVG uses C.t4 as its fill/stroke color
All visually discrete elements (inactive icons, dividers, placeholder text) reference C.t4

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/components/RoleSelection.tsx` (or `RoleSelectionV2.tsx`, whichever is currently active in ScreenRouter), replace the navigation target for the 'Professionnel' role selection with a render of `<ProApp />`. The old broken pro space component must no longer be rendered when the user selects 'Professionnel'. Import ProApp from `./ProApp` and render it in place of the previous pro route/component.

quotes: La sélection du rôle existe déjà. Quand user tape 'Professionnel' sur l écran choix du rôle → afficher <ProApp /> directement.
Remplacer l ancien espace pro cassé par ce nouveau composant.

acceptanceCriteria: Selecting 'Professionnel' on the role selection screen renders <ProApp /> instead of any previously broken pro component
The client navigation flow is completely unaffected
No black screen or crash occurs after selecting the professional role

constraints: Do not modify or rebuild the existing client navigation flow in App.tsx or ScreenRouter.tsx
Do not use React Router, any external routing library, or URL-based navigation inside ProApp.tsx
Do not touch immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
ProApp.tsx must be a single self-contained component file — no new context providers, no new global state outside the component
nonGoals: Rebuilding or modifying any part of the existing client-side app
Adding backend endpoints or Motoko logic
Implementing real Stripe/payment processing inside ProApp
